text: K madyanitam [My poslali] ikh brata Shu'ayba. On skazal: "O moy narod! Poklonyaytes' Allakhu. Net u vas inogo boga, krome Nego. K vam prishlo yasnoye znameniye ot vashego Gospoda. Ne obmerivayte i ne obveshivayte lyudey [pri sdelkakh], ne obmanyvayte ikh v voprosakh imushchestva i ne rasprostranyayte nechestiya na zemle, posle togo kak ustanovlena na ney pravednost'. Tak luchshe dlya vas, yesli vy - veruyushchiye
